summary:
Cancer is a serious disease where cells in the body grow out of control. It can form tumors and spread to other areas. There are many types, and some common signs are lumps, unusual bleeding, or weight loss.

Smoking and a poor lifestyle cause a lot of cancer cases. Infections and environmental factors also play a role. Some cancers can be prevented by healthy choices and vaccines.

Doctors use different treatments like surgery, chemo, and radiation. Early detection is key, and screening helps find some cancers. With treatment, many people survive, especially children.
title: Cancer
